puzzle.help: 1. Enter every letter from A to Y into the grid. 2. Each letter is next to the previous letter either horizontally, vertically or diagonally. 3. The clues around the edge tell you which row, column or diagonal each letter is in.

levels.level: RCVWKLG` P A O` N I` S J` T F` U Y` HDEQXMB`
